member.name: F:OnLineTest.DBUtility.EffentNextType.None
member.summary: 对其他语句无任何影响

member.name: F:OnLineTest.DBUtility.EffentNextType.WhenHaveContine
member.summary: 当前语句必须为"select count(1) from .."格式，如果存在则继续执行，不存在回滚事务

member.name: F:OnLineTest.DBUtility.EffentNextType.WhenNoHaveContine
member.summary: 当前语句必须为"select count(1) from .."格式，如果不存在则继续执行，存在回滚事务

member.name: F:OnLineTest.DBUtility.EffentNextType.ExcuteEffectRows
member.summary: 当前语句影响到的行数必须大于0，否则回滚事务

member.name: F:OnLineTest.DBUtility.EffentNextType.SolicitationEvent
member.summary: 引发事件-当前语句必须为"select count(1) from .."格式，如果不存在则继续执行，存在回滚事务

member.name: T:OnLineTest.DBUtility.DbHelperMySQL
member.summary: 数据访问抽象基础类 Copyright (C) yxshu

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.DbHelperMySQL.GetMaxID(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 得到最大值
member.returns: 如果查询结果为null则返回1，否则返回查询结果的第一行第一列的整数形式+1

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.DbHelperMySQL.Exists(System.String)
member.summary: 是否存在,基于无参数的sql语句
member.returns: 如果存在返回true,否则返回false

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.DbHelperMySQL.Exists(System.String,MySql.Data.MySqlClient.MySqlParameter[])
member.summary: 是否存在（基于MySqlParameter）
member.returns: 如果存在返回true,否则返回false

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.DbHelperMySQL.ExecuteSql(System.String)
member.summary: 执行SQL语句，返回影响的记录数

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.DbHelperMySQL.ExecuteSqlByTime(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: 基于尝试时间的执行SQL语句，返回受影响的行数

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.DbHelperMySQL.ExecuteSqlTran(System.Collections.Generic.List{OnLineTest.DBUtility.CommandInfo},System.Collections.Generic.List{OnLineTest.DBUtility.CommandInfo})
member.summary: 执行MySql和Oracle的混合事务
member.returns: 执行结果 0-由于SQL造成事务失败 -1 由于Oracle造成事务失败 1-整体事务执行成功

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.DbHelperMySQL.ExecuteSqlTran(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: 执行多条SQL语句（ExecuteNonQuery），实现数据库事务。
member.returns: 返回0表时事务失败，大于0表时事务执行成功

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.DbHelperMySQL.ExecuteSql(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 执行带一个存储过程参数的SQL语句。
member.param: @content参数内容,比如一个字段是格式复杂的文章，有特殊符号，可以通过这个方式添加

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.DbHelperMySQL.ExecuteSqlGet(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 执行带一个存储过程参数的的SQL语句。
member.param: 参数内容,比如一个字段是格式复杂的文章，有特殊符号，可以通过这个方式添加
member.returns: object obj = cmd.ExecuteScalar();返回第一行第一列

member.summary: 向数据库里插入图像格式的字段(和上面情况类似的另一种实例)
member.param: @fs图像字节,数据库的字段类型为image的情况

member.returns: 查询结果（object 查询结果的第一行第一列）

member.name: T:OnLineTest.DBUtility.OracleHelper
member.summary: A helper class used to execute queries against an Oracle database

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.OracleHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a database query which does not include a select
member.param: Command type either stored procedure or SQL
Parameters to bind to the command

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.OracleHelper.Query(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 执行查询语句，返回DataSet

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.OracleHelper.GetSingle(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 执行一条计算查询结果语句，返回查询结果（object）。

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.OracleHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Execute an OracleCommand (that returns no resultset) against an existing database transaction using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(trans, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new OracleParameter(":prodid", 24));
member.param: the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
an array of OracleParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.OracleHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Execute an OracleCommand (that returns no resultset) against an existing database connection using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new OracleParameter(":prodid", 24));
member.param: the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
an array of OracleParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.OracleHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Execute an OracleCommand (that returns no resultset) against an existing database connection using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new OracleParameter(":prodid", 24));
member.param: the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.OracleHelper.ExecuteReader(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter[])
member.param: the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
an array of OracleParamters used to execute the command

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.OracleHelper.ExecuteScalar(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Execute an OracleCommand that returns the first column of the first record against the database specified in the connection string using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: Object obj = ExecuteScalar(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new OracleParameter(":prodid", 24));
member.param: a valid connection string for a SqlConnection
the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
an array of OracleParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: An object that should be converted to the expected type using Convert.To{Type}

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.OracleHelper.ExecuteScalar(System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a OracleCommand (that returns a 1x1 resultset) against the specified SqlTransaction using the provided parameters.
member.param: The stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
An array of OracleParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: An object containing the value in the 1x1 resultset generated by the command

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.OracleHelper.ExecuteScalar(System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Execute an OracleCommand that returns the first column of the first record against an existing database connection using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: Object obj = ExecuteScalar(conn, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new OracleParameter(":prodid", 24));
member.param: the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
an array of OracleParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: An object that should be converted to the expected type using Convert.To{Type}

member.summary: Add a set of parameters to the cached

member.name: T:OnLineTest.DBUtility.SqlHelper
member.summary: The SqlHelper class is intended to encapsulate high performance, scalable best practices for common uses of SqlClient.

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.SqlHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand (that returns no resultset) against the database specified in the connection string using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new SqlParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: a valid connection string for a SqlConnection
the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.SqlHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand (that returns no resultset) against an existing database connection using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new SqlParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.SqlHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand (that returns no resultset) using an existing SQL Transaction using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new SqlParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.SqlHelper.ExecuteReader(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand that returns a resultset against the database specified in the connection string using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: SqlDataReader r = ExecuteReader(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new SqlParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: a valid connection string for a SqlConnection
the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParamters used to execute the command

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.SqlHelper.ExecuteScalar(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand that returns the first column of the first record against the database specified in the connection string using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: Object obj = ExecuteScalar(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new SqlParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: a valid connection string for a SqlConnection
the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: An object that should be converted to the expected type using Convert.To{Type}

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.SqlHelper.ExecuteScalar(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand that returns the first column of the first record against an existing database connection using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: Object obj = ExecuteScalar(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new SqlParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: An object that should be converted to the expected type using Convert.To{Type}

member.summary: add parameter array to the cache
member.param: an array of SqlParamters to be cached

member.name: M:OnLineTest.DBUtility.SqlHelper.PrepareCommand(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Prepare a command for execution
